name: ListCandidateNotes
description:
Retrieve all notes associated with a candidate.

Use this tool to retrieve all notes related to a specific candidate. This is useful for reviewing feedback or comments made during the recruitment process.

parameters.name: candidate_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the candidate to list notes for. Use this to specify which candidate's notes you want to retrieve.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API
